LanguageData.MFI_HuntersLodge.label: hunters lodge
LanguageData.MFI_HuntersLodge.letterText: You are invited to {0}'s {1} summer retreat. {2}. There is an outpost at the site with all the required facilities to make meals, and they've extended their hospitality to you. This offer expires in {3} days.
